name: Come to your senses (Subbu)
description:
NO GAMEPLAY LOOP. UNFINISHED. SEE VIDEO FOR REFERENCE.  SORRY AND THANK YOU.

use gamepad left stick to move or wasd.

you can pick up the sense organs using the 'A 'button or 'space'on keyboard.

you can throw by pressing the 'Y' button or 'F 'on keyboard.

reset by 'back/selec't button or' R' on keyboard - (this breaks the game apparently)

theres no lose or win state. 

collect the senses and click 'A' button or 'space' again to equip it. this will charge the sense.

you can throw the sense item which is not of the same type to the enemy to destroy them. they reduce the power of cards you collect. again there is no point to this. there was supposed to be, but maybe later.
